page.title: 07FAVOURITE THINGS OF INFANTS
page.content: We asked the six and seven year olds of our school some questions about what they like.We asked them what their favourite television programme was ,their favourite sport, their favourite colour ,and their favourite sweet was.Altogether there were 12 children. The most common sweets were {bubble gum}and{toffee,}they also liked lollies,opal fruits,chewing gum, bon-bons, and polos.Their favourite sport was{swimming},then came football,running and tennis.The favourite colour was {blue},followed by green and orange.The most popular t.v. programme was {He-man}(a cartoon),second was Dogtanian(another cartoon). Cartoons were by far the most popular type of programmes.
